lead_paragraph: Dr. Eric Chivian, the founder of the Center for Health and the Global Environment at Harvard Medical School, writes that “our government seems more interested in protecting companies” that produce and use certain insecticides “than in protecting honeybees.”

headline.main: What’s Behind the Collapse of Honeybee Colonies
headline.print_headline: What’s Behind the Collapse of Honeybee Colonies
